byline.contributor: Karen Workman and Arielle Dollinger contributed reporting.
byline.original: By SARAH MASLIN NIR and EMILY PALMER

abstract: Collision between two Long Island Railroad trains in Nassau County injures thirty-three people; accident comes less than two weeks after New Jersey Transit train crash in Hoboken Terminal, prompting concerns about area's rail safety.
lead_paragraph: The collision, involving a maintenance train and a commuter train, sheared chunks off the commuter train cars, several of which derailed just east of the New Hyde Park station in Nassau County.
snippet: The collision, involving a maintenance train and a commuter train, sheared chunks off the commuter train cars, several of which derailed just east of the New Hyde Park station in Nassau County....

headline.main: 33 Injured in Collision of L.I.R.R. Trains
headline.print_headline: L.I.R.R. Train Collision Injures 33 and Traps Riders
